name: Keeper of Balance
description:
The planet is running out of space due to overpopulation! As the Keeper of Balance, you must ensure the population is perfectly balanced, as all things should be. Defeat the 3 heroes holding the 3 Eternity Emeralds to unlock the ultimate power to “keep the balance”. 

  • The game ends either when the population reaches zero or 100%
  • Destroy cities to reduce the population growth
  • Defeat the heroes and take their Eternity Emeralds to gain new abilities
  • Using the ultimate power heals you to full health and respawns the heroes
  • See how long can you keep the balance! 

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42 Jam. The theme was "running out of space". 

Controls

  • Keyboard and Mouse:

    • WASD - movement
    • Mouse - aim
    • Left mouse click - punch
    • 1 - Emerald of Ages Power (Slow Time)
    • 2 - Emerald of Void Power (Dash Attack)
    • 3 - Emerald of Strength Power (Projectile Spread)
    • Space - Ultimate Power (Halves the population)
